# init(options:)

**Initializer**

Creates an option object that represents the union of the supplied options.

## Declaration

```swift
init(options: Set<NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions>)
```

## Parameters

- **options**: A set of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions] objects.

## Creating a compression option

- **init()**: Creates an option object containing no options.
- **init(identifier:)**: Creates an option object with the given identifier string.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates an option object from data in an unarchiver.
